title: What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream who is silent?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream and he is silentSeeing the dead in a dream is one of the strange visions, and some people believe that the interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream and he is silent provides a message to the one who saw the vision and began to search for an interpretation of the vision. Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream and he is silentIn the interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream and he is silent, this indicates a person’s success in his academic and practical life. If the dreamer sees the dead person in his hand with a fruit and eats from it until he is full, this is evidence of his satisfaction of the need and his success in work. In the event that the deceased is seen silent and wearing black clothes, this is evidence that the dreamer will gain his position among people, as well as great fame. If the dreamer sees the deceased wearing blue clothes, this is evidence of the dreamer’s desires being fulfilled. In the event that he sees the deceased silent, but wearing red clothes, this indicates that the dreamer is characterized by nervousness because he has run out of patience in his life and as a result of his impatience he loses many things in his life. In another interpretation, seeing the dead person in red clothes, this is evidence that the dreamer wants to achieve his dreams, but by illegal means, and this pushes him to enter hell. Interpretation of seeing the dead person in a dream and he is silent by Ibn Sirin Through the site, we explain Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream, which is: Ibn Sirin explains that seeing the dead in a dream while he is silent, this is evidence that the dead only wants to control you. However, if you see the deceased silent and you are sitting next to him, this is evidence that the dead wants charity and begging. And to interpret seeing a dead person in a dream while he is silent, but he started talking to the fortune teller because this is evidence that the fortune teller will be affected by many good things and many doors of livelihood will open for him. But if you see the deceased in a dream and he is happy but he is an unknown person, this is evidence that your dreams will come true, God willing. And if you see the deceased in a dream and he is sad, this is evidence of the dreamer’s inability to achieve his dreams. Interpretation of seeing a dead man in a dream while he is silent about an unmarried woman Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing the dead in a dream for an unmarried woman with several interpretations, which are: If the father or mother of an unmarried woman dies and someone can come to her in a dream while he is silent, this is evidence that the girl is doing something in her life that her parents do not like. However, if she is unmarried and sees a deceased in a dream while she is standing, shaking hands with him and greeting him, this is evidence that this deceased Longing for the girl. In the case of an unmarried woman who sees herself hugging her father in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will live a long life, and this is one of the praiseworthy visions. Read also: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about heavy rain in Ibn Sirin’s dream. Interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream while he is silent about the pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin. If a pregnant woman sees the deceased silent in a dream, this is a sign of her safety and survival from any problems in pregnancy. But if he sees in a dream a dead pregnant woman offering him food, this is a sign of the nourishment that he will soon receive. If the pregnant woman sees that the dead feeds her a lot, this is evidence of her prayers for him, and in another interpretation she loses her money

title: Interpretation of rain in a dream Rain water in a dream

preview.html: A vision of light rain falling on a person, for an unmarried woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a man walking in the rain, or for heavy or light rain, by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of rain in a dream Seeing rain in a dream symbolizes the release of emotions and internal feelings from their suppression When you see yourself wet with rainwater, this indicates that you will soon be freed from worries and problems Seeing rain falling from the window means the good news that you will receive Seeing rain and sun means serious success Rain in a dream is calm and light, symbolizing that you are about to have a comfortable experience Or you need to get away from thinking and preoccupation with worries and thoughts to a state of relaxation Being heavy and close to the storm symbolizes some feelings that overwhelm you and occupy your mind, such as severe sadness or grief. Sorry about the end of a relationship or separation from a friend If you see the ground in a dream watching a flooded state after or during the rain, this reflects your loss of awareness of the situation in which you are freed from suppression, which exposes you to the risk of drifting into unwanted reactions Seeing rain in a dream indicates the return of some feelings after a period of emotional stagnation or lack of feelings due to mental preoccupation with matters Another. Whoever dreams that he washed himself with rainwater or performed ablution with it, he is justice in his religion and in his world. Whoever dreams that it rains at the beginning of the year or at the beginning of the month, there will be prosperity and blessing in that year or in that month. If the rain falls heavily like a flood, the inhabitants of that place will suffer from severe distress. If the rain is specific, as if it falls on a house or a place, it is illness and disease or calamity and experience. If the rain falls, it is good or beneficial. Whoever dreams of sweeping rainwater will be safe from fear. Whoever dreams of rain falling from the sky does not resemble the appearance of rain. If the patient dreams that light rain has fallen, he will be cured. Whoever dreams that he drinks from rainwater, if it is clean, he will be cured, and if he is sick as long as he drinks it, he will be sick. Interpretation of the dream of rain by Ibn Sirin Whoever sees general rain in the land, if the world is very fertile, and its price is cheap, either by the rain as he saw it, or for his company, or ships that deliver food, and if they are in injustice, torment and disease, they will be relieved. Is the rain at that time beneficial, and is it harmful or does it contain a stone or fire that is frequent and repeated according to the intensity of the rain and its weakness. If it is a sprinkle, then the matter is light as it appears, and whoever sees himself in the rain or confined by it under a roof or wall, then he orders him to be harmed with words and evil, or he wants to be struck by the amount of rain that hit him, or if he is sick, or it was his time, or it was the place. Interpretation of rain in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Whoever sees rain in his own house, without people, will attain goodness, righteousness and dignity. It was said: If the rain contains dirt without dirt, then it is fertility. If the rain is honey, then it is good for all people, and likewise if it is ghee, milk, oil and the like, and rain is evidence of God’s mercy, religion, relief and help. Perhaps it indicates the epidemics that fall from the sky, such as locusts, hail and wind, especially if it has fire and what

If it is spraying, then the matter is light in what appears. And whoever sees himself in the rain or is confined to it under a roof or wall, he is commanded to harm him with words. It was said: If the rain contains dirt without dirt, then it is fertile, and if the rain is honey, then it is good for all people, and the same applies if it is ghee, milk, oil, and the like, and rain is evidence of God’s mercy, religion, help, and help. Perhaps it indicates epidemics that fall from the sky, such as locusts, hail, and wind, especially if they contain fire, etc.

title: Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering ducks in a dream

preview.html: If the dreamer has enemies, then slaughtering ducks in a dream indicates the end of hostility. Slaughtering ducks in a dream generally indicates stability in psychological and social life, and the following is the interpretation of seeing a dream about ducks in a dream. Interpretation of seeing ducks in a dream Seeing ducks slaughtered in a dream means a good life And high morals. As for seeing ducks screaming in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer has suffered the loss of a family member. But if an unmarried girl dreams that she is slaughtering ducks, this indicates the superiority she has gained in her education. Interpretation of seeing ducks being slaughtered in a dream for a single woman: A single girl saw ducks in her dream, then this dream indicates that she is active and energetic. If she dreams that she is slaughtering ducks, this dream indicates the success of her romantic relationship. But if a single girl sees black ducks in her dream, this indicates safety and psychological comfort. But if a girl sees A married woman herself in a dream eats duck meat, this indicates patience, wisdom, and respect for others. Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering ducks for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is slaughtering ducks in her dream, this indicates the stability of family life and deep love between her and her husband. If a married woman dreams that she is slaughtering Ducks and gives them to her husband, this means that she will receive a lot of money, kindness, and food. But if a married woman sees clean ducks in her dream, this means that she will live with a lot of money without fatigue or difficulties. Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering ducks for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees a slaughtered duck in In her dream, it means that she will face extreme exhaustion in her quest to find a source of livelihood. If a pregnant woman sees that her husband slaughters ducks and gives them to a fortuneteller, this indicates his intense love for her and he will stand by her side in some problems. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that ducks are slaughtered for food This means that she will get a lot of money without getting tired. If a pregnant woman dreams that her family is slaughtering ducks, this indicates her deep love for them. Interpretation of seeing a slaughtered duck in a dream Seeing a slaughtered duck in a dream is one of the beautiful visions that shows the state of all one’s problems. If a married man sees a slaughtered duck in a dream, this indicates haste in making important decisions and a weak character. If one sees a slaughtered duck in his dream, this means that goodness and blessings will come. If an unmarried girl sees a slaughtered duck in her dream, this means that the owner of The vision has gone through a period full of some events. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a black duck and that she is feeding it, this means that big dreams will come true. If the dreamer sees a black duck in his dream, this indicates a good heart and a sober mind. If a young man sees a black duck in his dream This indicates sadness and anxiety in his life. In conclusion, we mentioned to you the interpretation of seeing ducks slaughtered in a dream, and we hope that you have benefited from it.

title: The most prominent interpretations of Ibn Sirin’s vision of seeing the king in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the king in a dream: A person may see many things in a dream that he does not know their interpretation or what they may mean. In this case, dreams may occupy his mind and make him think about every moment or feel extreme anxiety and a lot of tension, something that can shake his life. What is the interpretation of seeing the king in a dream? The dream? The appearance of the king’s door and his moving to one of the other areas where he is not present indicates that he will marry a second wife and have a second home to obtain the comfort he is looking for. Interpretation of the king’s dream: The situation of appointing a man to an important position, such as a representative or another, symbolizes many good things. That he will acquire in the near future and the great material gains that will be his portion and will make him feel happy. If the same person is a king and appears to him in a dream for a century or two, this is evidence that he will exercise great influence in many countries and will be able to impose his own control over the various places that exist. Throughout the East and West as well. A man entering the house where the king resides is a wonderful thing, because it indicates that the coming days will bring a lot of good news for him and that he will have a great position and many important things that he will do will be entrusted to his best. Color Black, if it appears in what the king is wearing in the dream, may indicate imposing great control over everyone, while white is a sign of abandoning all the pleasures of life, repenting for wrong deeds and returning to the Lord of the Worlds. The worlds are blessed and exalted. What is the meaning of seeing the king in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? The translator Ibn Sirin explained all the cases in which the king could be seen and what each case could mean for them individually, and this can be clarified in the following points: If he saw him in his dream and used his own seal to print Giving someone any of the areas under his control is one of the things that portends a lot of goodness and means that this person will have great decision and power and will rule over many important areas. In which he dreamed of obtaining a high position. If anyone gives any kind of material or thing in his dream, it is often evidence that he will be good and that the coming days in his life contain many beautiful things that will satisfy his heart. The appearance of light in his home If a person is able to see him clearly, it is a sign that one of the family disputes in his house has ended in real life and that it was difficult for him to find an appropriate solution to it or know the path to guidance in it. What is the meaning of seeing the dead king in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? A man sitting with him is one of the most important things. Good, it indicates the large amount of money he will get from work or trade, which will completely change his life for the better and make him help. To improve his living conditions. Shaking hands in a dream in the event of his death in reality and exchanging hugs with each other are indications of the presence of a lot of happy news.

title: Learn the interpretation of seeing boarding a plane in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of boarding a plane in a dream: Seeing a plane is considered one of the visions in which the connotations varied, between contemporary and ancient jurists. Perhaps the variety of connotations is due to various factors, including whether the person is boarding the plane alone or with another person and boarding the plane. The plane can be for performing Umrah or for urgent travel, and the plane can be military or regular, and what concerns us in this article is to mention all the indications and cases of seeing boarding a plane in a dream. Learn about the interpretation of seeing boarding a plane in a dream. Seeing boarding a plane in a dream. Seeing boarding a plane expresses It indicates the presence of constant movement in the dreamer’s life, and continuous movements, which make him lose his stability and stability in a certain situation. If one sees that he is flying a plane, this indicates the presence of many obstacles and difficulties in his path, and overcoming these obstacles is the first step to achieving the desired success. It also indicates This vision is about the great desires and aspirations that a person seeks to achieve, regardless of the obstacles that prevent him from doing so. On the other hand, this vision indicates the presence of inner desires that insist on the individual’s liberation from the status quo, achieving individuality, and adopting different paths. And if one passes through... With psychological crises, this vision is an indication of the transitional period that a person is going through and the internal wars in which victory depends on his will. However, if the dreamer is afraid of boarding a plane, this symbolizes a trip that does not achieve the desired goal and the effort he makes without benefiting from it in anything. Seeing riding a plane in a dream according to Ibn Sirin is not worth anything. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the plane is not available to us, because the plane and today’s means of transportation were not common in the time of the Sheikh. Seeing a plane or flying indicates high ambitions and desires, hard work to achieve other goals, and notable successes on all levels. Levels. This vision is also an indicator of power, strength and authority, achieving a prestigious position and achieving brilliant achievements. If one sees it flying, this indicates travel in the near future, permanent travel and the ability to achieve the desired goal of this travel, whether it is work or study. Also This vision expresses a rapid change in circumstances, entering another life, and the necessity of adapting to new changes, so that a person does not miss the opportunities and offers that are before his eyes. If the viewer does not feel fear while flying the plane, this indicates entering into new experiences, entering into interesting adventures, and gaining a lot. of experience and achieving great profits. If the person controls air traffic, this symbolizes control over all current situations, transferring full responsibility to him, and the need to be careful not to make any mistake that could harm him. In short, seeing boarding a plane is an indication of a journey towards God. Or in other words, walking on the path of truth, and wanting to reach the Great Lord with good deeds. Seeing a plane ride in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a plane ride in her dream shows changes in her life.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a mother’s sadness in a dream and its interpretations

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: Seeing a mother’s turmoil in a dream, the mother considers the warm embrace of her children, as she is the first to recognize the child and remains most of his life linked to her, as she is the one who carried her ninth child. He spent months and endured hardships to see her, took care of her, raised her, and spent the night to stay comfortable and healthy, and considered her mother a refuge and bond. Children, it is not easy for her to see them in a bad condition, so children must be careful to honor their mother, so what is the interpretation of a dream to see a mother’s sadness in a dream. Interpretation of a dream to see a mother’s sadness in a dream for a single woman: This vision shows that there are wrong behaviors that this girl will follow In her life and her mother may get angry with her, this is a sign to stop doing wrong things and get back on the right track: An unmarried girl will go through troubles and troubles when she sees her mother’s sadness in her dream. She will also lose success in her life because of some wrong behaviors that she does. Soon this girl will get married Also, when she sees her mother kicking her out of the house in a dream. In addition, she will suffer from some problems in her life, and she may also contract some diseases. In addition, she is marrying a wealthy and well-off man, who also has good morals. Moreover, this is news Sarah tells him that she will succeed and excel in her studies or work. This may also indicate a debt to the mother that she was unable to repay in her life when seeing the deceased mother in a dream. He will also be able to quickly overcome the adversities and problems that will soon befall him. title: Interpretation of a dream about a wedding for a single girl: Secrets of seeing a wedding in one dream

preview.html: In detail, learn about the interpretation of a dream about a wedding for a single girl. Marriage is every girl’s dream since childhood, as every girl dreams of wearing a white dress and sitting with the knight of her dreams in the kosha. A single girl dreams that she is getting married and is looking for an interpretation of this dream to know what is good or bad for her. The groom.Marriage is one of the good and praiseworthy things in reality that fills the world with happiness and joy, but what about the interpretation of marriage in one dream? This is what we will learn in the next article from the Encyclopedia, so follow us.Interpretation of the dream of marrying an unmarried girl by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that the vision of marriage In a dream, it means searching for stability, affection, and creating a family and children, and you are very happy with it. However, if an unmarried girl dreams that she will marry someone she does not know, this means that she will receive a significant increase in money and living, and this vision indicates that she will find a new job, Her fiancé. But if she sees someone pressuring her to marry or asking her to marry, this indicates that she will suffer a lot of problems with those close to her because of the issue of marriage. Wedding in a dream for a single woman. Muhammad ibn Sirin explained that seeing a wedding in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that express The authority, pride, dignity, chastity, honour, chastity and chastity that this girl enjoys in this people. Perhaps seeing a wedding in a dream for an unmarried woman symbolizes the approaching date of her wedding in reality and that her marriage will be to a good young man with good morals and a good religion that she will be happy with in her coming days. An unmarried woman seeing a full wedding ceremony in a dream expresses that she will indeed have an emotional connection and will be engaged, but it will not be completed and the engagement will be doomed to failure, and God knows best. The marriage of an unmarried woman in a dream to someone she does not know indicates that she will acquire an abundance of property and wealth. And goodness in this world, God willing. Whoever sees herself in a dream marrying a person she loves and has an emotional relationship with, her vision shows her deep desire to marry that person, and this vision can express the girl’s ability to reach all her dreams and ambitions in the world. Ready. Seeing marriage to a familiar person in a dream is an indication of the ease and comfort that a girl will have in her life and also portends for an unmarried woman the fulfillment of an ambition or dream that she has been trying to achieve for a long time. Interpretation of a dream about a single woman marrying someone she loves. An unmarried woman who sees Herself wearing a wedding dress and attending her wedding means that she will be able to fulfill a great, cherished desire that she has been searching for for a long time. This vision symbolizes the entry of an unmarried woman into a new phase of her life full of joy, pleasure, joy, livelihood, and blessings. When a single woman sees in her dream that she is getting married If someone is already married, her vision can express that she will face some problems and difficulties in the next period of her life. By seeing her marrying a married man whom an unmarried woman knows, her vision represents an unmarried woman.

title: Interpretation of seeing a naked man in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a man’s genitals in a dream is one of the most important interpretations that causes panic and fear for many people. Many dream interpretation scholars have worked hard to explain the interpretations of seeing a man's genitals in a dream. Once you see a man's nakedness in a dream, expect that here there are many problems that you will face in your life and you will remain in a state of stress and sadness, but the matter is different. Seeing a man's nakedness in a dream. Evidence of the fortuneteller’s position and high status, whether in his scientific or practical life, and interpretations of seeing nudity in a dream vary depending on how the god sees nudity. Together, let us learn about the interpretation of seeing a man’s nakedness in a dream through our encyclopedia. The interpretation of seeing a man naked in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a man’s nakedness when he is single, and if an unmarried woman sees a man’s nakedness in her dream. This is evidence that God Almighty will give this girl a high position in her professional life. She reached the highest levels in her work as well as in her scientific life. He will achieve whatever scientific achievements he has always sought to achieve, but if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she keeps a man’s organs. This is a sign that someone will propose to her soon. This happens if this woman is unknown to her, but if she sees that he is keeping the private parts of a man she knows. This is proof that this person is chasing her everywhere and trying to get close to her in every possible way, but she does not give him a chance. Until he speaks to her, and this is evidence of how close this girl is to God Almighty, as it is evidence that this girl fears God in secret and in public, and that she wants a legitimate relationship that pleases God and her Messenger. Razia, and this may be an indication of the bad behavior of this man who is pursuing her, and that he does not have good morals. Therefore, he does not agree to be her future husband. For disobeying his Lord, and this is a sign that this girl thinks well about her life and is good at things, and is not deceived by appearances, and what is most important to her is the purity of the essence.Interpretation of seeing a man’s private parts for a married womanAnd if a married woman sees a man’s private parts in a dream. This is evidence that God Almighty will grant this woman success in her life, and that He will give her, her children, and her husband the highest ranks in their lives. This is evidence that this woman gives her husband all his marital rights, and is able to manage the affairs of her household to the fullest extent, and this is evidence that this woman shares with her husband in all the work that he does. In order to make the family happy, and make it lasting happiness and lasting pleasure. But if a woman sees in a dream that one of the women is trying to see her husband’s genitals. This is evidence that this woman is chasing her husband everywhere and wants to marry him, but this man does not care about her, and this is evidence of this husband’s loyalty to his wife, and that he gets everything possible. She means pleasing him, and he appreciates this action of hers. It is better than him. Interpretation of seeing a man’s nakedness while pregnant, and if a pregnant woman sees a man’s nakedness in her dream. This is evidence that this woman; Almighty God will write her salvation

title: Interpretation of toothache in a dream Toothache in a dream

preview.html: A dream about toothache for a single woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced man, for a dead man. If my teeth move and are worn out and a tooth falls out, swelling of the gums. I dream of pain in my teeth, removing dental fillings. Ibn Sirin and others. The pain of a molar in a dream or feeling pain in it is one of the confusing visions for a large segment of people, and to see a tooth in a dream. Whether it is removed or removed from the dreamer's mouth or feels upset by it. One of the visions that carries many clues, meanings, and symbols. Through our topic today, we will learn the interpretation of seeing a tooth and everything related to it in detail. Interpretation of toothache in a dream. Tooth decay in a dream indicates concern about an illness or disease afflicting the dreamer. Tooth decay in a dream indicates the presence of corrupt people in the dream. Your life or an uncomfortable situation at work. If you see yourself filling a broken tooth in a dream or repairing it, this may indicate the recovery of something you lost, whether material or moral. Removing a decayed tooth in a dream indicates getting rid of this annoying situation, whether it is a person or a specific situation. Removing a rotten tooth in a dream may indicate getting rid of a financial crisis or overcoming difficulties at work. Seeing teeth vibrating in a dream indicates an unstable condition, whether physical, psychological, or social. If you see a single tooth vibrating in your dream, whether you feel it with your hand or tongue, it may indicate It indicates an unstable situation. The shaking of a single tooth can indicate that someone in your environment is not trustworthy. All or some of the teeth are shaking in the dream, which indicates instability at the family or parental level. The pain resulting from the teeth in the dream indicates the harm that the dreamer may suffer from Before some of his relatives and perhaps treatment or speech. Interpretation of toothache in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The translator, Sheikh Al-Kabir Ibn Shirin, believes that seeing a tooth in a dream is interpreted according to the condition in which the labial tooth appeared in the dream. Ibn Shirin believes that the vision appears good or bad, depending on the details of the dream. Seeing the good appearance of a human tooth and its excellent condition is evidence of goodness and the appearance of sustenance for the dreamer. A white tooth also indicates pleasant events, joy and joy in the dreamer’s life. Seeing the repair of an injured tooth and cleaning it in a dream, Or getting rid of pain in a dream and resting, symbolizes removing sorrows and difficulties from the dreamer’s life, God willing. Seeing a toothache also indicates that the dreamer is being betrayed by someone around him or is exposed to competition with family and relatives. Also, seeing a tooth falling out symbolizes the dreamer’s pain. And his suffering, it may symbolize the death of a close relative if he falls to the ground or if all the molars fall out. Seeing molars and their ugly appearance in a dream could symbolize the dreamer being exposed to difficulties in his life that cause him worry and anxiety. Interpretation of a molar in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a molar falling to the ground symbolizes To the death of one of the people close to the unmarried girl. As for it falling into the hand, it is good news, happiness, and good news, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing the appearance of an ugly molar, whether dirty or rotten, indicates that the girl
